description:
Rokuson is a Sika Deer shikigami used by Yura Keikain. He has extraordinary jumping power and the kanji for his name written on either cheek. He is named for the star Phecda of the constellation Ursa Major, which was called "Rokuson" in scriptures from China`s Tang Dynasty.
Source: nurarihyonnomago.wikia.com
name: Rokuson
